>
[Straveika](/Feats.aspx?ID=5713) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=750" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=641" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You descend from one of the truly ancient vampires, a [nosferatu](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=273) cursed to eternal life but not eternal youth. People call you straveika, or ancient-born. The vestiges of your forebear's powers of domination have left you with an understanding of how a creature's intentions change its behaviors. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=2302) and Perception DCs against attempts to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=2389) to you.
